name: FEDERATION OF SRI LANKAN LOCAL GOVERNMENT AUTHORITIES
memberOrga: As the national Local Government we represent the interest of all local authorities in Sri Lanka, in this regard we are linked to the Mayors/Chief Executive officers of all the councils from time to time. In addition we also interact with National and Provincial Ministries of Local Govt.
goal: FSLGA is working towards strengthening the local government authorities in Sri Lanka. Our objectives include coordinate a unified approach among Local Govt. Bodies to resolve common issues. we also aim to incrase the voices and effective participation of councilors I LAs in planning and development and decision making within the framework of participatory democracy.  Establishing a good relationship with the Central and Provincial Govts. in the shared interests of all levels of governments and the citizens of sri lanka.
